text: Nizhneye Absalyamovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Ariyevsky Selsoviet, Duvansky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 13 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 9 km from Mesyagutovo, 2 km from Ariyevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Duvansky District
title: Nizhneye Absalyamovo
